mapper.insert: insert into exam_paper (exam_paper_id, exam_code, paper_code, del_flag) values (#{examPaperId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{examCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select exam_paper_id, exam_code, paper_code, del_flag from exam_paper
